Key Match Events: Edwin Díaz walked two batters and gave up a game-winning grand slam to Corbin Carroll.
Corbin Carroll hit two home runs, including a game-winning grand slam.
Luis Severino was hit by a line drive and continued to pitch despite being in pain.
Post-Match Reflections: Edwin Díaz expressed disappointment, saying 'It’s a tough loss. We had it.'
Brandon Nimmo acknowledged the uphill battle for the Mets in the wild-card race.
Luis Severino mentioned he was in a lot of pain but expected to recover.
Brandon Nimmo emphasized moving forward despite the loss.
Others: The Mets bullpen was short-handed due to Dedniel Núñez's unavailability.
The Mets are four games behind Atlanta in the National League wild-card race.
